GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves the review with the given review id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves the comments on the review with the given review id

comments.body: My dog loves this game too!
comments.author: maillionaire

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: servers the user with the given username

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the review with the given review id and serves the newly added comment

exampleRequest.body: My cat loves this game too!

comment.body: My cat loves this game too!
comment.author: maillionaire

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: increments the votes on the review with the given review id and serves the newly updated review

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: increments the votes on the comment with the given comment id and serves the newly updated comment
